value.description: value for the parameter. In Jtoken

ArmTemplateParameter.description: Parameter to pass to ARM template

error.description: The error details for a failed request.

applicationId.description: The applicationId of the appliance for this association.

ManagementAssociationProperties.description: ManagementAssociation properties supported by the OperationsManagement resource provider.

value.description: List of Management Association properties within the subscription.

applicationId.description: The applicationId of the appliance for this Management.

parameters.description: Parameters to run the ARM template

parentResourceType.description: The type of the parent resource.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state for the ManagementConfiguration.

template.description: The Json object containing the ARM template to deploy

ManagementConfigurationProperties.description: ManagementConfiguration properties supported by the OperationsManagement resource provider.

value.description: List of Management Configuration properties within the subscription.

operation.description: Type of operation: get, read, delete, etc.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed etc.

display.description: Display metadata associated with the operation.

Operation.description: Supported operation of OperationsManagement resource provider.

value.description: List of solution operations supported by the OperationsManagement resource provider.

OperationListResult.description: Result of the request to list solution operations.

SolutionPatch.description: The properties of a Solution that can be patched.

name.description: name of the solution to be created. For Microsoft published solution it should be in the format of solutionType(workspaceName). SolutionType part is case sensitive. For third party solution, it can be anything.

product.description: name of the solution to enabled/add. For Microsoft published gallery solution it should be in the format of OMSGallery/<solutionType>. This is case sensitive

promotionCode.description: promotionCode, Not really used now, can you left as empty

publisher.description: Publisher name. For gallery solution, it is Microsoft.

SolutionPlan.description: Plan for solution object supported by the OperationsManagement resource provider.

containedResources.description: The azure resources that will be contained within the solutions. They will be locked and gets deleted automatically when the solution is deleted.

items.description: the azure resourceId of the resource.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state for the solution.

referencedResources.description: The resources that will be referenced from this solution. Deleting any of those solution out of band will break the solution.

items.description: the azure resourceId of the resource.

workspaceResourceId.description: The azure resourceId for the workspace where the solution will be deployed/enabled.

SolutionProperties.description: Solution properties supported by the OperationsManagement resource provider.

value.description: List of solution properties within the subscription.
